General.Name: Anhui Water Resources Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Construction Engineering Group Co., Ltd. undertakes various construction projects in China. The company engages in construction, water conservancy and hydropower, highway, municipal public, port and waterway, and mechanical and electrical engineering construction; highway subgrade, highway pavement, bridge, tunnel, urban landscaping, river and lake renovation, steel structure, building decoration and decoration, building curtain wall, fire protection facility, construction electromechanical installation, and lifting equipment installation engineering; infrastructure and environmental protection project investment and operation; water conservancy and hydropower resource development; real estate development; foreign project contracting, import and export of goods or technologies; and metal structure processing, production, installation; engineering survey, planning, design, consulting, construction engineering and traffic engineering research and development, consulting, testing, supervision. The company was formerly known as Anhui Water Resources Development Co., Ltd. Anhui Construction Engineering Group Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Bengbu, China.
